title-group.article-title: History, Theory and the Narrative Turn in IR

p.mixed-citation: R. F. Berkhofer, Beyond the Great Story: History as Text and Discourse (Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1995).
G. Roberts (ed.), The History and Narrative Reader (London: Routledge, 2001).
